original_text: My God will not accept them as his people, because they have not obeyed him. They will have no home of their own. They will have to live among different nations. My God will not accept them as his people, because they have not obeyed him. They will have no home of their own. They will have to live among different nations. My God will not accept them as his people, because they have not obeyed him. They will have no home of their own. They will have to live among different nations. My God will not accept them as his people,
korean_text: 그들이 듣지 아니하므로 내 하나님이 그들을 버리시리니 그들이 여러 나라 가운데에 떠도는 자가 되리라

sentences.original_text: My God will not accept them
sentences.korean_translation: 내 하나님이 그들을 받지 않으실 것이며

sentences.original_text: as his people
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 백성으로 삼지 않으실 것이니

sentences.original_text: because they have not obeyed him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 순종하지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: They will have no home of their own
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 집이 없게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will have to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 살아야 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: among different nations
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 민족 가운데서 살아야 할 것이다
